message: Let's split this fairly, Bob. 60/40 sounds good to me.
I think I deserve a bit more, 55/45 is more reasonable.
Bob, the value decreases with each round. Let's settle this now. I'll take my previous offer of 55/45.
You're right, time is money. But I still think I deserve a bigger share. 58/42 is my new offer.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. I'm lowering my share again, but this is the last time. 52/48, take it or leave it.
I'm not backing down. You've lost a lot of value already, 60/40 is my new offer.
